Description:
A newly established company based in Baghdad is seeking a highly motivated and proactive individual to oversee all financial aspects of the organization, ensuring financial health and success of the company. Experience working in logistics industry, within matrix structure and diverse team is desired. The ideal candidate should be a bilingual (Arabic & English) speaker.Duties and Responsibilities:       Oversee all financial operations, including budgeting and cost control, cash flow management, and financial reporting.
Ensure accurate and timely preparation of financial statements, management reports, and financial performance analysis
Monitor financial performance, identify trends, risks, and opportunities, and recommend appropriate actions to achieve financial objectives.
Establish strong internal controls, financial policies, and risk management frameworks.
Ensure compliance with relevant financial regulations, laws, and reporting requirements.
Foster effective communication and collaboration with other departments and senior management.
Evaluate and recommend funding options, including debt and equity financing.
Develop relationships with financial institutions, negotiate financing terms, and manage banking relationships.
Ensure accurate and timely bookkeeping, bank reconciliations, and invoicing.
Maintain compliance with relevant tax laws and regulations.
Utilize related software tools to efficiently manage financial data and communications between the team and external clients and suppliers.
Collaborate with external advisors, auditors, and tax professionals as needed and with the utmost professionalism.
Willingness to take on additional tasks and adapt to changing priorities as required.Skills

Financial Management

Capital Management and Financing
